feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove the empty placeholder for typesWithoutPlaceholder by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/768
  • Sitemap integration by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/769
  • Version in self hosted by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/770
  • Fix form editor history

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.8.0: Public API release & bug fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ESC-575 If operator has no format and no expected_type, it means it doesn't n‚Ä¶ by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/767
  • Update dependencies and refactor CameraUpload component to use ZXing ‚Ä¶ by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/760
  • Add Tabler Icons and Refactor Form Components by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/771
  • ESC-590 - Fix UUID and Auto Increment ID Generation Logic in StoreFormSubmissio‚Ä¶ by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/774
  • Rich text Multiline placeholders by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/773
  • Secret input is now PRO Feature by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/778
  • Add the mentions feature on the Sender name of the email by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/780
  • Refactor OptionSelectorInput and InputWrapper Components for Improved‚Ä¶ by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/777
  • Custom domain restriction by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/785
  • ESC 602 - Fix Update Record by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/787
  • Refactor MatrixInput Component to Use Composition API and Improve Rea‚Ä¶ by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/792
  • Update OpenCompleteForm to Use Query String for URL Parameters by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/791
  • feat: Introduce Public API with Sanctum Token Authentication by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/788

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.7.3...v1.8.0

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: New Dashboard UI üßë‚Äçüé®
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ESC-615 - Enhance FormSubmissionFormatter to Support Link Creation for File Values by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/794
  • ESC-620 - fix: Update tooltip property in FlatSelectInput component by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/798
  • 209a6 tailwind + nuxt UI migraiton by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/813

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.8.0...v1.9.0

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: Better self-hosted onboarding
New release for OpnForm: Fix dark mode issues + Root redirect on `/`
